Find answers to common questions about using Soukify or contact our support team for assistance.
How do I create a shop on Soukify?

To create a shop, go to the Shop tab and tap the "Create Shop" button. Fill in your shop details including name, description, category, location, and contact information. Once submitted, your shop will be visible to other users.
What categories of products can I sell?

Soukify supports various categories including: Pottery & Ceramics, Textile & Tapestry, Gourmet & Local Foods, Natural Wellness Products, Jewelry & Accessories, Metal & Brass Crafts, Painting & Calligraphy, and Woodwork.
How do I add products to my shop?

After creating your shop, you can add products by going to your shop page and tapping the "Add Product" button. Enter product details like name, description, and price. You can add multiple products to showcase your inventory.
Can I edit my shop information after creating it?

Yes, you can edit your shop information at any time. Go to your shop page and look for the edit options. You can update your shop name, description, contact information, and other details to keep your customers informed.
How do customers find and contact my shop?

Customers can discover your shop through browsing categories, searching by location, or using the search feature. They can view your shop details, see your products, and contact you using the information you provide (phone, email, or address). Make sure your contact information is accurate and up-to-date.
Is Soukify free to use for sellers?
Yes, Soukify is completely free to use for sellers. There are no setup fees, monthly charges, or commissions. You can create a shop, list products, and manage your business at absolutely no cost.
How do I manage orders and payments?

Soukify focuses on connecting buyers with local artisans and shop owners. When customers are interested in your products, they can contact you directly through the phone, email, or address information you provide. You handle orders and payments directly with customers, giving you full control over your business relationships and transactions.
Can I sell products in multiple categories?

Yes, you can list products in multiple categories as long as they fit the category requirements. Each product should be listed in the most appropriate category to help customers find what they\'re looking for easily.
How do I delete my shop or account?

You can delete your shop or account through the settings menu. Go to Account Settings, scroll to the bottom, and select "Delete Account" or "Close Shop". Please note that this action is permanent and cannot be undone.
What are the best practices for successful selling?

To succeed on Soukify: 1) Take clear, high-quality photos of your products, 2) Write detailed descriptions including dimensions and materials, 3) Set competitive prices, 4) Respond quickly to customer inquiries, 5) Maintain good ratings by providing excellent service, and 6) Keep your inventory updated regularly.

• Shop details (shop name, description, location)

We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this privacy policy. We may share information with:

• Service providers who assist in operating our service

We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no internet transmission is completely secure.

You have the right to:

• Opt-out of non-essential communications
